document_data.name: Ettercap
document_data.based: J. R. R. Tolkien's usage of ''[[wiktionary:en:attercop|attercop]]''
document_data.mainbody: '''Ettercaps''' were a race of bestial, [[spider]]-like [[aberration]]s, also categorized as [[monstrosities]] by some, found throughout [[Faer√ªn]]. They were primitive hunters that had an affinity with spiders.
document_data.Description: An adult ettercap stood {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}} tall and weighed {{SI|200|lbs.|k|long=yes}}. Ettercaps resembled hunched, grey-purplish [[humanoid]]s with distended white underbellies, spider-like faces (fangs and eyes and such), and two sharp, black chitinous claws instead of hands and feet.
document_data.Personality: They were not particularly intelligent. They were cowardly and vicious, preferring to set traps to ensnare their enemies. Ettercaps tended to be solitary creatures and their only purpose was to eat and to breed.
document_data.Abilities: Ettercaps possessed the capability to shoot sticky webs. They also possessed a debilitating venom in their bite.
document_data.Tactics: They used their webs as traps to capture prey.
document_data.History: It was suggested that ettercaps were the descendants of a group of mad [[druid]]s, tainted and transmogrified by their association with a powerful [[demon]] into a form resembling the predatory arachnids their cult once revered. While the vast majority had completely reverted to pure animal instinct, a rare few claimed to demonstrate the intellect and capacities of an insane human.

Society.Language: Ettercaps possessed a fairly simple, spider-derived language of their own. It was focused around basic and real-world concepts, not equipped for the discussion of abstract ideas. They were capable of understanding other languages, such as [[elven]], but could not speak them due to lacking the right vocal cords.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Lady in Flames|10}}
Society.Usages: A crafting recipe for a ''[[wand of lightning]]'' found in the arcane ''[[Imaskarran Tome of  Resonance]]'' included ettercap's silk gland, [[cranberry|fenberries]], and the spell of ''[[lightning bolt]]''.<ref name=NWN>
